title: #9 Connor Coleman
itunes:title: #9 Connor Coleman
itunes:summary: Connor Coleman is a land management consultant based in the Roaring Fork Valley near Carbondale, CO. His interdisciplinary experiences in wildland firefighting, environmental management, forestry, ranching, and conservation have all shaped his career into what it is today. During the episode, we discussed all these subjects and more as we loosely followed Connors career path. Check out Resiliency Lands, and look out for Connor as a recurring guest!
description: Connor Coleman is a land management consultant based in the Roaring Fork Valley near Carbondale, CO. His interdisciplinary experiences in wildland firefighting, environmental management, forestry, ranching, and conservation have all shaped his career into what it is today. During the episode, we discussed all these subjects and more as we loosely followed Connors career path. Check out Resiliency Lands, and look out for Connor as a recurring guest!
